story.name: Home
story.content: {"_uid":"0dea219c-9aae-4c49-aad6-b0007feccd24","body":[{"_uid":"4dff828f-65c7-497c-b661-a66dabe2035b","title":"It's okay to talk.","component":"hero","hero_image":{"id":11714782,"alt":"","name":"","focus":"","title":"","source":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1350x1275/75e771494e/hero-image-900x850.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset","meta_data":{},"is_external_url":false},"button_text":"Find your nearest group","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB are a men’s suicide prevention charity, offering free-to-attend peer-to-peer support groups across the United Kingdom and online. We want to end the stigma surrounding men’s mental health and help men through the power of conversation. #ITSOKAYTOTALK","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"","url":"find-your-nearest-group","anchor":"","linktype":"url","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"find-your-nearest-group"},"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"40d23509-6fab-4521-b907-229f687c50d7","position":"right","component":"badge","background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"65e248aa-3fce-4762-a134-3234d3add250","label":"Who we are","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"WE BREAK DOWN ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"THE STIGMA OF MEN’S ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"MENTAL HEALTH.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB has over 120 free support groups nationwide, running every Monday from 7PM except bank holidays. In these groups, men can open up about the storms affecting their lives in a safe, judgement-free and non-clinical environment. Our clubs are designed to be free of pressure, there is no obligation for men to speak, they can simply listen if they wish.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"With over 2800 men using our sessions every week, and an army of 900+ volunteers on board, the movement is continuing to grow week-by-week. We firmly believe in the power of talking and that #ItsOkayToTalk.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Established in 2016 by Elaine, Andy’s Mum, and Luke, Andy’s Brother-in-Law, the aim of the club is to provide men with a safe space where they feel comfortable to talk and open up about their experiences in a room free of judgment.","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"two-column-text","button_text":"MORE ABOUT US","button_target":{"id":"39488ed5-eee3-4521-a5a1-49ba60d35f41","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"who-we-are"},"background_color":"bg-black","white_background":false},{"_uid":"0fe0bfdf-977f-4b92-804c-e2c2b1a91d36","image":{"id":11714894,"alt":"","name":"","focus":"","title":"","source":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/2000x1500/76b2e55798/central-brand-trio-1000x750-tbb.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset","meta_data":{},"is_external_url":false},"label":"","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"THE FIRST RULE ABOUT ANDYSMANCLUB IS","type":"text"},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"IT’S OKAY TO TALK","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"AT ANDYSMANCLUB.","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Simply put, that’s the whole point. It’s a group where men don’t have to battle to be heard or listened to, but where they can join the fight to reduce the rate of suicide in men.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"simple-center-branded-with-image","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"5c7f33ff-88ba-4f2a-8e7a-f229e34e9c51","image":{"id":4954197,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/370x550/206a991cb2/andy-roberts-370x550.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"OUR WHY","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"WE HAVE ONE AIM, ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"TO HELP ONE GUY, ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"TO SAVE ONE LIFE.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB takes its name from Andrew Roberts, ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"a man who sadly took his own life aged 23 in early 2016. Andy was a lovely and doting father, son, brother, grandson, nephew, cousin and friend, and was just 23 years old when he was taken away by suicide, sadly and tragically without warning.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"On average one man every two hours takes his life in the UK. It’s often said to be a factor is that men don’t talk. That’s why ANDYSMANCLUB was born. Established in 2016 by Luke Ambler, Andy’s brother-in-law, the aim of the club is to break down these stigmas, support men struggling, and lend a hand to suicide prevention. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"That change starts with you...","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"two-column-text-image","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-white","black_background":false},{"_uid":"7ba4b4b3-5fed-48bd-8772-ce8783d8f604","items":["a90d4838-a4a8-43b1-b116-6570dee4f52c","81060992-5c2d-493c-ab61-51099242f06d","d6620ff6-fad7-4eab-b5cb-e6cf09b4774f","2491ff4d-9d76-4f56-9eb9-ec56f4fd3c1a","47d92cc1-1121-4e80-acbc-18bf5a058c0e","ad622251-7e87-46f5-a7d3-a1d45a74ccd6","479639d6-9eec-4f98-a00b-7c51725e4be8","6619150e-ffc6-49fc-b82c-df7f1c38e011"],"label":"","title":"OUR GROUPS","component":"groups","button_text":"SEE ALL OUR Men Attending.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"115+ Groups.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"900+ Facilitators.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We're a brotherhood.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}]}]}]},"component":"offset-image-and-text","background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"866aa238-9027-4294-b505-eaa2900eb2e7","items":[],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"THE LATEST","custom_title":"NEWS & VIEWS","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"1e9b16e2-63f9-4573-ba84-af219d60df5e","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ALL OUR GROUPS MEET MONDAYS AT 7PM ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"(EXCEPT BANK HOLIDAYS).","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We run talking groups for men who have either been through a storm, are currently going through a storm, have a storm brewing in life or just want to meet a good group of people with the aim of improving one another. No referral, no registration and no charge. Even the brew and biscuits are free!","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"simple-centered-branded","button_text":"FIND YOUR NEAREST GROUP","button_target":{"id":"","url":"find-your-nearest-group","linktype":"url","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"find-your-nearest-group"},"background_color":"bg-white","black_background":false}],"meta":{"_uid":"38cfd264-3c2e-4428-ae53-a27cd7b28113","title":"Andy's Man Club | #ITSOKAYTOTALK","plugin":"seo_metatags","og_image":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1000x700/305854c2f3/andysmanclub-image.jpg","og_title":"","description":"ANDYSMANCLUB are a men’s suicide prevention charity, offering free-to-attend peer-to-peer support groups across the United Kingdom and online.","twitter_image":"","twitter_title":"","og_description":"","twitter_description":""},"component":"page"}
